messages.subject: re: amily relations
messages.msgSnippet: ... You ve got three more years of INTENSIVE unschooling immersion behind you - conferences and discussions and readings and first-hand experience. Next time,
messages.messageBody:
On 3/28/2010 2:16 AM, unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> I'm hoping this next time I'll manage to stay calmer and not let my
> own expectations of how a family should be come in the way of how this
> family actually is.

You've got three more years of INTENSIVE unschooling immersion behind
you - conferences and discussions and readings and first-hand
experience. Next time, I'll bet you'll let anything she says that is
critical or negative just sip right by you, as the inconsequential
comments of someone who doesn't have a clue what she's talking about.
When you have no doubts, you can take criticism a lot more easily.
Smile, inside, and think, "Poor her - she's so clueless."

-pam
